slug.description: The theme's slug. If the theme belongs to an area, prepend the slug with the area plus "::". E.g. admin::cartalyst/default

parent.description: The slug of the parent theme.

author.description: The author's name. This could be their name, nickname or company name.

version.description: The version of the theme. Must match format, Max 2 dots, 3 numbers between dots.
